description: This file is a complete HTML page implementing a web-based database viewer interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript logic for fetching and displaying database information, tables, and data dynamically.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Loads list of databases from the backend API and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases by re-invoking loadDatabases.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables, and loads tables data.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for the selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a specific table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for table data and inserts into container.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects, long strings, and null values.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for detailed view.
